topic.fullpath: Topic :: Desktop Environment :: K Desktop Environment (KDE)

name: Eksposé
short_description: A utility-program for the K Desktop Environment (KDE) with similar functionalities as Apples Exposé currently available in Mac OS 10.3. The program enables a user to get a one-click overview over open windows on their desktop.
